isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 30-SI AND 30-SI/TR SERIES - REPAIR PROCEDURES - BEARING REPLACEMENT

svcsubproc.title: Drive End Frame Bearing
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 15for all item number callouts in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove 4 screws that fasten the bearing retainer (Item 17, Figure 15) to the inside of the drive end frame (Item 12).
Push on inner race to remove bearing (Item 13) from the drive end frame.
Pull seal (Item 16) from the bearing retainer (Item 17) and the outer seal (Item 10) from the drive end frame (Item 12).
Install new bearing (Item 13) in drive end frame by pressing on outer race of bearing.
Install new seals (Item 16) in bearing retainer (Item 17) and outer seal (Item 10) in the drive end frame (Item 12) with lip of seal toward the bearing.
Position bearing retainer (Item 17) inside of drive end frame (Item 12) and over bearing (Item 13). Fasten bearing retainer to end cover with 4 screws.
Press inside collar (Item 14) on rotor shaft (Item 18).
Press rotor shaft through bearing (Item 13) until inside collar (Item 14) rest against the inner race of the bearing.

caution.para: Support drive end frame (Item 12) so it will not be damaged while pressing the rotor shaft through the bearing.

svcsubproc.title: Rectifier End Frame Bearing Replacement
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 16for all item number callouts in parentheses.

step1.para: Pull inner race (Item 3, Figure 16) from rotor shaft (Item 2).
Press new inner race (Item 3) on rotor shaft (Item 2).
Press new bearing (Item 5) into the end frame (Item 1) with the seal (Item 4) away from the grease reservoir (Item 6).
Fill reservoir (Item 6) half full of lubricant as specified in Group 10, LUBRICATION of the Service Manual. Arrange lubricant so a portion will contact the bearing.
Press plug (Item 7) into end frame (Item 1) until flush with the reservoir opening.
